title: Riot should implement a Dodge Vote System ~~
body: Everyone has had those teams where you got one person that is Mid or Feed and you go mid and so does he. Well when nobody on your team wants to dodge this solves the problem. Its treated like /ff. in the champ select you type /dg in the chat bot and it pulls up a box saying "Name" Has started a dodge vote. Would you like to Dodge? Yes/No. The people who say yes will not lose LP or have a time limit their first time. More so after the first two in a day they start losing the standard amount. > 3 lp and 6 mins. Dodging the old fashion way would still be something for people who get denied the dodge vote. The punishments will still apply for this. Im honestly tired of dodging sometimes when i get a troll and losing 6 mins of my play time that i could be playing a game with. So riot please take a look at this and give your thoughts. I honestly think it will be a good addition to the Community

Riot already has came up with a solution. There is a new champ select, it give you one of the two role that you Queue for automatically. For example, I would mark support as primary and mid as my secondary (there is also a "Fill" option for those that are confident with themselves), then the system would literally tell everybody where they need to go. Therefore, I don't think there would be much of a troll "I only play ___" in champ select anymore, the whole idea that you describe would actually be the new way to troll if it was implemented, since you can now have a 3/4 man solo queue, they already made up over 50% of the vote for dodge just because that one guy tell his friends to.{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
